Title: Shettima pays condolence visit to Buhari’s family in London
Summary: Nigeria’s Vice President, Kashim Shettima, has paid a condolence visit to the family of the late former President Muhammadu Buhari in London . arrangements are underway for the repatriation of his remains to Nigeria .

Title: Police dismantle two major human trafficking syndicates, rescue dozens
Summary: Nigeria Police high command said it has dismantled two major trafficking syndicates operating in different parts of the country . Police rescued several victims, including children, pregnant women, and foreign nationals, and arrested 11 suspects in coordinated sting operations .

Title: Gospel minister Lilian Nneji to hold live concert July 20
Summary: Gospel minister Lilian Nneji to hold live concert July 20 . The concert will be held in Lagos at the end of July . According to the minister in a recent interview, the minister will be known for her popular chorus .

Title: HURIWA knocks National Assembly for suspending duty to mourn Buhari
Summary: The Human Rights Writers Association of Nigeria (HURIWA) has slammed the leadership of the National Assembly over the sudden shift of legislative duties . HURiWA’s National Coordinator, Comrade Emmanuel Onwubiko, wondered why the legislators did not take the same path .

Title: Fagbemi mourns Buhari, recalls role in justice reforms
Summary: Lateef Fagbemi (SAN) joined President Bola Tinubu and other Nigerians in mourning the death of former President Muhammadu Buhari . The Attorney-General of the Federation (AGF) described his passing as a profound national loss .

Title: Wike, eight other ministers appointed into committee for Buhari’s funeral
Summary: Wike, eight other ministers appointed into committee for Buhari's funeral . The committee will be headed by the Secretary to the Government of the Federation, Senator George Akume .

Title: Presidency postpones Tuesday special FEC to honour Buhari
Summary: Presidency postpones Tuesday special FEC to honour Buhari . Session originally scheduled for July 15, 2025 was to be held in honour of the late former President Muhammadu Buhar .

Title: Arsenal target Eberechi Eze for midfield reinforcement
Summary: Arsenal target Eberechi Eze for midfield reinforcement ahead of 2025/26 season . Manager Mikel Arteta is looking to strengthen his creative options in midfield . Crystal Palace midfielder Eze is a potential reinforcement for the Gunners .

Title: Burnley owners acquire La Liga side Espanyol
Summary: Espanyol will become the second team under VSL control after English outfit Burnley . But the clubs "will remain independent" Espanyols will be the second VSL team under control after Burnley's purchase .

Title: Members of PDP, APC, others defecting to ADC — Rivers chair
Summary: The Chairman of the African Democratic Congress in Rivers State, Lawrence Egbagiri, said over one thousand people have registered with the party in the state since the coalition was formed . Title: Buhari used second coming to correct past mistakes, NLC mourns
Summary: Muhammadu Buhari died in a London hospital on Sunday at 82 . He served as Nigeria’s democratically elected President from 2015 to 2023 and previously as military Head of State between January 1984 and August 1985 . The NLC made this known in a tribute signed by its national president, Joe Ajaero .

Title: FG understudies Lagos' blue economy model for national development
Summary: Federal Government began the understudy of the Lagos State Government Blue Economy project . The understudy is being carried out by the participants of the National Institute for Policy and Strategic Studies, Kuru, Plateau State . The theme of the study tour is: “Blue Economy and Sustainable Development in Nigeria: Issues, Challenges and Prospects

Title: 'We were in the same hospital,' Abdulsalami recounts Buhari’s final moments
Summary: Former Head of State, General Abdulsalami Abubakar (retd.), has revealed that he was admitted to the same hospital in London as former President Muhammadu Buhari . Title: Tinubu constitutes committee for Buhari’s funeral
Summary: President Bola Tinubu has approved the formation of an Inter-Ministerial Committee to oversee the planning and coordination of a state funeral for the late former President Muhammadu Buhari .
